reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, flattering, and well-made, with one mentioning it hides tummy bulge.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Fall dress for Florida!
items.body: Cute fall dress and well made. The fabric is soft with sufficient stretch. Short but acceptable. I’ll be careful when bending over.. Cute with boots. Nice for Florida fall/winter as we never get really cold here. This will be a great dress for a country concert. Love the color. The belt has enough structure so that it actually stays in place and I don’t think I will need to replace it. Read more
items.author: 50 and fit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and look
items.body: This dress has a great fit. I was a little nervous as I read the reviews but decided to stick to my usual size of M. Glad I did. It has enough stretch where it doesn't feel snug at all. It's very flattering. I'm 5'1 and it was plenty short (I also feared that it would be too long). I've been wanting to purchase this for a while and glad I finally did. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but color is not as vibrant as picture
items.body: This is cute. It fits really nice and the material and zippers seem well-made. I deducted one star because the color is not near as vibrant as the pictures. It is a more of a dull Green. Read more
items.author: Dave Eifrid

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks amazing on!
items.body: Super flattering on! The material is light weight, soft, nice detail, and the perfect length! Doesn’t feel like “real” corduroy but still nice. I did have to size up to get it over my hips. I started with a small and got a medium. I’m 5’7 and between 135-140 lbs. Read more
items.author: Ryan Roeschen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short
items.body: Cute but super short and I am only 5ft tall. The back pockets were up on my lower back. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress!
items.body: I love this dress. It goes great with boots or dressy shoes. Great fit, true to size. Read more
items.author: Sherry Roberts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this one! Worth it!
items.body: I am not a huge fan of corduroy, but I decided to give this dress a try because I love the utility yet stylish look. I am so glad I did! The style and cut of the dress are very flattering, with the belt that cinches the waist a bit. I also love that the dress is a little bit shorter than most dresses I own. I am petite, 4‘11“ and every dress goes to my knees or longer. This one is a couple inches above the knee and Although it has a collar and short sleeves, it does look sexy and has the zipper option to show a little cleavage or cover the chest. I also thought it was going to be heavy and very thick, but it is not. It is right in the middle and I ended up getting a black and a white one. I think my favorite is the black. The white one fits a little bigger in the shoulders and neck area so I’m still contemplating returning it. My recommended size was a small and it does work, but it’s a little roomy. I am also small chested so if you have a bigger bust, you may want to size up a little. Read more
items.author: Christina W.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small, but super cute
items.body: This dress is so cute. I ordered a large, based on Amazon's selection and the sizing chart. I couldn't get it zipped over my hips (and I have super narrow hips). There is zero stretch so keep that in mind when purchasing. The color is beautiful and it looks like it costs more than it does. I ordered the XL and it will be here tomorrow and I am hoping that it fits. Read more
items.author: J. B. Queen

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Blue, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
